title: Population Europe
subtitle: A large share of #Refugees in #Belgium get a job w/in 5 years of arrival, but the 1st job is often unstable. @MyriaBe @BrunoSchoumaker looked at #asylum seekers’ trajectories using the #NationalRegister & social security database. #emn More: https://www.myria.be/files/integrated_version_EMN_Myria_WEB.pdf …pic.twitter.com/2cBDH9Qr5r

title: Amnesty St Albans
subtitle: At least seven #Rohingya #refugees have been killed in recent months by police in the Cox's Bazar camp in #Bangladesh - @amnesty is concerned that these are extra-judicial killings - #HumanRights of the refugees must be respected https://www.amnesty.org/en/documents/asa13/1317/2019/en/ …pic.twitter.com/IvsBM8FYOc
